name: Crash Course (bleedthesecolours)
description:
In a world of automated machinery and pre-calculated moves, a mysterious malware has suddenly struck the citysphere throwing everything off-balance. With your brakes disabled and no end in sight, can you survive the long, perilous road ahead?

Goal: Avoid the crates, grab the golden spanners, and overtake all 3 malfunctioning garbage trucks to win this hardcore race of life and death!

Includes: 1P and 2P modes!

// CONTROLS //

  • Steer: A/D or Left/Right arrow keys
  • Boost: Space (Solo Mode only)
  • Restart: R
  • Pause: Tab
  • Quit: Esc
  • Slow-Mo: ...?

// ANY SUGGESTIONS OR CONSTRUCTIVE CRITICISMS? //

A little too hardcore? Controls don't feel right? Everything too fast to react? Poor camera angle? Please leave a (friendly but fair) comment with your thoughts!
